text: Franc Veliu (born 11 November 1988 in Vlorë) is an Albanian professional footballer who plays mainly as a defender for Kosovan club Gjilani and the Albania national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup ContinentalIncluding continental competitions, such as UEFA Champions League and UEFA Europa League ContinentalIncluding continental competitions, such as UEFA Champions League and UEFA Europa League OtherIncluding other competitions, such as Albanian Supercup OtherIncluding other competitions, such as Albanian Supercup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Flamurtari Vlorë Flamurtari Vlorë Flamurtari Vlorë League League Albanian Cup Albanian Cup Europe Europe Other Other Total Total 2006–07 Flamurtari Vlorë Albanian Superliga 8 1 ? ? – 0 0 8 1 2008–08 24 2 ? ? — — 24 2 2008–09 29 2 7 3 — — 36 5 2009–10 32 3 0 0 2 0 1 0 35 3 2010–11 30 1 4 0 — — 34 1 2011–12 24 3 12 3 4 0 — 40 6 2012–13 24 1 8 3 2 0 — 34 4 2013–14 21 1 5 0 — — 26 1 2014–15 18 0 4 0 3 1 1 0 26 1 Total Flamurtari Vlorë Flamurtari Vlorë 210 14 40 9 11 1 2 0 263 24 Kukësi Kukësi Kukësi League League Albanian Cup Albanian Cup Europe Europe Other Other Total Total 2015–16 Kukësi Albanian Superliga 8 0 4 0 — — 12 0 Total Kukësi Kukësi 8 0 4 0 — — 12 0 Career total Career total Career total 218 14 44 9 11 1 2 0 275 24 ===International=== Franc Veliu | National Football Teams 31 December 2014 Albania national team Albania national team Albania national team Year Apps Goals 2011 3 0 2012 3 0 2013 1 0 Total 7 0 ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Flamurtari Vlorë *Albanian Cup: 2008–09, 2013–14 ===Individual=== *Albanian Superliga Player of the Month: November 2010 == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Albanian footballers
